sentences.sContent: Some people use marijuana to fight pain or discomfort caused by disease.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some people use marijuana to fight pain or discomfort caused by disease.
sentences.sCn: 有些人使用大麻来对抗疾病引起的疼痛或不适。

sentences.sContent: Happily, there was no apparent discomfort to any of the animals, although therewere some changes in pigmentation and superficial damage to the skin.
sentences.sContent_eng: Happily, there was no apparent discomfort to any of the animals, although therewere some changes in pigmentation and superficial damage to the skin.
sentences.sCn: 令人高兴的是，虽然有某些色素沉着的改变和皮肤表面的损伤，这些动物没有出现明显的不适。

trans.tranOther: a feeling of slight pain or of being physically uncomfortable
